videos.title: Termux Installation
videos.description: Is video mein hum dekhenge ki kaise aur kaha se termux install karna hai

videos.title: Basic Commands Tutorial
videos.description: Terminal mein navigate karna aur basic commands use karna seekhiye. pwd, ls, cd jaise important commands ki practice.

videos.title: File Management in Termux
videos.description: Files aur folders create, copy, move aur delete karna. Complete file management tutorial.

videos.title: Package Management - Software Install
videos.description: Termux mein software install karna. Python, Git aur other tools install karne ka process.

videos.title: Python Programming in Termux
videos.description: Termux mein Python programming start karna. Basic scripts banane ka complete process.

videos.title: Git & GitHub in Termux
videos.description: Git version control aur GitHub use karna. Repository management aur collaboration.

videos.title: NetHunter Installation Guide
videos.description: NetHunter Rootless install karne ka complete process. Step by step installation aur troubleshooting.

videos.title: VNC Server Setup
videos.description: VNC server setup kar ke graphical interface use karna. Desktop environment access.

videos.title: Nmap Network Scanning
videos.description: Nmap tool use kar ke network scanning karna. Port scanning aur service detection techniques.

videos.title: Metasploit Framework Basics
videos.description: Metasploit framework ka introduction aur basic usage. Penetration testing ke liye essential tool.
